info.name: OED
info.description: This collection contains API requests for OED.

item.name: conversion_segments

request.description:
## Purpose

---

To add a new conversion segment, it must span all time (âˆ’infinity to infinity), and no other segment for that conversion can exist.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| sourceId | integer | yes |
| destinationId | integer | yes |
| weekPatternsId | integer | no |
| slope | number | yes |
| intercept | number | yes |
| startTime | string | yes |
| endTime | string | yes |
| note | string | no |

## Purpose

---

Edit a conversion segment.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| sourceId | integer | yes |
| destinationId | integer | yes |
| weekPatternsId | integer | no |
| slope | number | yes |
| intercept | number | yes |
| startTime | string | yes |
| endTime | string | yes |
| note | string | no |
| originalStartTime | string | yes |
| originalEndTime | string | yes |

**Note**: This route only supports updates where the new start and/or end time extends into the immediately adjacent segments.

## Purpose 

---

Retrieve all conversion segment objects associated with the source meter id and destination meter id.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| sourceId | integer | yes |
| destinationId | integer | yes |

response.name: 200 OK - Retrieved Segments
response.body:
[
    {
        "sourceId": 5,
        "destinationId": 3,
        "weekPatternsId": null,
        "slope": 0.1,
        "intercept": 2,
        "startTime": "-infinity",
        "endTime": "2015-03-17T00:00:00.000Z",
        "note": "Note for new segment"
    },
    {
        "sourceId": 5,
        "destinationId": 3,
        "weekPatternsId": null,
        "slope": 2.1,
        "intercept": 1.5,
        "startTime": "2015-03-17T00:00:00.000Z",
        "endTime": "2021-10-09T00:00:00.000Z",
        "note": "Note for new segment"
    },
    {
        "sourceId": 5,
        "destinationId": 3,
        "weekPatternsId": null,
        "slope": 0.0000273,
        "intercept": 0,
        "startTime": "2021-10-09T00:00:00.000Z",
        "endTime": "2023-05-03T00:00:00.000Z",
        "note": null
    },
    {
        "sourceId": 5,
        "destinationId": 3,
        "weekPatternsId": null,
        "slope": 0.75,
        "intercept": 1.3,
        "startTime": "2023-05-03T00:00:00.000Z",
        "endTime": "infinity",
        "note": "Note for new segment"
    }
]

request.description:
Retrieve a specific conversion segment object.

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| sourceId | integer | yes |
| destinationId | integer | yes |
| startTime | string | yes |
| endTime | string | yes |

## Purpose

---

Delete the specified conversion segment after updating the end time of the previous conversion segment, ensuring the conversion segments span all time.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| sourceId | integer | yes |
| destinationId | integer | yes |
| startTime | string | yes |
| endTime | string | yes |

## Purpose

---

Delete the specified conversion segment after updating the start time of the following conversion segment, ensuring the conversion segments span all time.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| sourceId | integer | yes |
| destinationId | integer | yes |
| startTime | string | yes |
| endTime | string | yes |

## Purpose

---

Split the specified conversion segment into two. The earlier segment uses the new slope, intercept, pattern, and note.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| sourceId | integer | yes |
| destinationId | integer | yes |
| startTime | string | yes |
| endTime | string | yes |
| newWeekPatternsId | integer | no |
| newSlope | number | yes |
| newIntercept | number | yes |
| newNote | string | no |
| splitTime | string | yes |

## Purpose

---

Split the specified conversion segment into two. The later segment uses the new slope, intercept, pattern, and note.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| sourceId | integer | yes |
| destinationId | integer | yes |
| startTime | string | yes |
| endTime | string | yes |
| newWeekPatternsId | integer | no |
| newSlope | number | yes |
| newIntercept | number | yes |
| newNote | string | no |
| splitTime | string | yes |

item.description: The **conversion_segments** folder contains API requests for managing time-varying conversion segments in the system. Segments for the same conversion must cover the entire timespan from `-infinity` to `infinity` without gaps or overlaps.

item.name: day_patterns

request.description:
## Purpose

---

Obtain all day pattern objects.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

response.name: 200 OK - Days Retrieved

request.description:
## Purpose

---

Obtain a specific day pattern object.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Holiday",
    "note": "Represents a typical holiday",
    "slope": 1.0,
    "intercept": 1.2,
    "segmentNote": "Segment inserted to ensure full time coverage."
}

request.description:
## Purpose

---

Add a new day and the default day segment associated with it.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| name | string | yes |
| note | string | no |
| slope | number | yes |
| intercept | number | yes |
| segmentNote | string | no |

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Weekday",
    "note": "Represents a typical weekday",
    "slope": 1.75,
    "intercept": 0.75,
    "segmentNote": "Segment inserted to ensure full time coverage."
}

request.description:
## Purpose

---

Edit a day pattern.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| id | integer | yes |
| name | string | yes |
| note | string | no |

## Purpose

---

Delete a day pattern. All day segments associated with it will also be deleted.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| id | integer | yes |

item.description: The **day_patterns** folder contains API requests for managing day patterns. A day pattern is a collection of day segments that together cover all 24 hours of a day.

item.name: day_segments

request.description:
## Purpose

---

Retrieve all day segment objects associated with a specific day pattern.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| dayId | integer | yes |

response.name: 200 OK - Retrieved Segments
response.body:
[
    {
        "id": 5,
        "dayId": 1,
        "startHour": 0,
        "endHour": 10,
        "slope": 1.5,
        "intercept": 2.2,
        "note": "Split Segment - New Values for Earlier Segment"
    },
    {
        "id": 1,
        "dayId": 1,
        "startHour": 10,
        "endHour": 12,
        "slope": -0.1,
        "intercept": 1.2,
        "note": "Updating slope and intercept"
    },
    {
        "id": 7,
        "dayId": 1,
        "startHour": 12,
        "endHour": 15,
        "slope": 1.1,
        "intercept": 3.1,
        "note": "Split Later - New Values for Later Segment "
    },
    {
        "id": 6,
        "dayId": 1,
        "startHour": 15,
        "endHour": 24,
        "slope": 1.4,
        "intercept": 2.2,
        "note": "Split Later - New Values for Later Segment "
    }
]

request.description:
## Purpose

---

Retrieve a specific day segment object.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| id | string | yes |

response.name: 200 OK - Retrieved Segment
response.body:
{
    "id": 1,
    "dayId": 1,
    "startHour": 0,
    "endHour": 24,
    "slope": 1.75,
    "intercept": 0.75,
    "note": "Segment inserted to ensure full time coverage."
}

request.description:
## Purpose

---

To add a new day segment, it must span all time (0 to 24), and no other segment for that day pattern can exist.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| dayId | integer | yes |
| startHour | number | yes |
| endHour | number | yes |
| slope | number | yes |
| intercept | number | yes |
| note | string | no |

## Purpose

---

Edit a pre-existing day segment object.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| id | integer | yes |
| dayId | integer | yes |
| startHour | number | yes |
| endHour | number | yes |
| slope | number | yes |
| intercept | number | yes |
| note | string | no |
| originalStartHour | number | yes |
| originalEndHour | number | yes |

**Note**: This route only supports updates where the new start and/or end hour extends into the immediately adjacent segments.

## Purpose

---

Delete a day segment after updating the start time of the following day segment to ensure full time coverage.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| dayId | integer | yes |
| startHour | number | yes |
| endHour | number | yes |

## Purpose

---

Delete a day segment after updating the end time of the previous time segment to ensure full time coverage.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| dayId | integer | yes |
| startHour | number | yes |
| endHour | number | yes |

body.raw:
{
    "id": 1,
    "newSlope": 1.5,
    "newIntercept": 2.2,
    "newNote": "Split Segment - New Values for Earlier Segment",
    "splitTime": 10
}

request.description:
## Purpose

---

Split the specified day segment into two. The earlier segment uses the new slope, intercept, and note.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| id | integer | yes |
| newSlope | number | yes |
| newIntercept | number | yes |
| newNote | string | no |
| splitTime | number | yes |

body.raw:
{
    "id": 1,
    "newSlope": 1.5,
    "newIntercept": 2.2,
    "newNote": "Split Segment - New Values for Earlier Segment",
    "splitTime": 10
}

{
    "id": 1,
    "newSlope": 1.1,
    "newIntercept": 3.1,
    "newNote": "Split Later - New Values for Later Segment ",
    "splitTime": 12
}

request.description:
## Purpose

---

Split the specified day segment into two. The later segment uses the new slope, intercept, and note.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| id | integer | yes |
| newSlope | number | yes |
| newIntercept | number | yes |
| newNote | string | no |
| splitTime | number | yes |

body.raw:
{
    "id": 1,
    "newSlope": 1.1,
    "newIntercept": 3.1,
    "newNote": "Split Later - New Values for Later Segment ",
    "splitTime": 12
}

item.description: The **day_segments** folder contains API requests for managing time-varying day segments in the system. Segments for the same conversion must cover the entire timespan from 0 to 24 without gaps or overlaps.

item.name: week_patterns

request.description:
## Purpose

---

Get all week pattern objects.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

response.name: 200 OK - Retrieved Weeks
response.body:
[
    {
        "id": 2,
        "name": "Summer 2025",
        "note": "This weekly pattern is for Summer 2025",
        "sunday": 4,
        "monday": 1,
        "tuesday": 1,
        "wednesday": 1,
        "thursday": 1,
        "friday": 4,
        "saturday": 4
    },
    {
        "id": 3,
        "name": "Spring 2025",
        "note": "This weekly pattern is for Summer 2025",
        "sunday": 4,
        "monday": 3,
        "tuesday": 1,
        "wednesday": 1,
        "thursday": 1,
        "friday": 1,
        "saturday": 4
    }
]

request.description:
## Purpose

---

Returns a specific week pattern object.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| id | string | yes |

## Purpose

---

Add a new week pattern.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| name | string | yes |
| note | string | no |
| sunday | integer | yes |
| monday | integer | yes |
| tuesday | integer | yes |
| wednesday | integer | yes |
| thursday | integer | yes |
| friday | integer | yes |
| saturday | integer | yes |

## Purpose

---

Delete a week pattern.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| id | integer | yes |

item.description: The **week_patterns** folder contains API requests for managing week patterns. A week pattern is a collection of day patterns that together cover all 7 days of the week.

item.name: conversions

request.description:
## Purpose

---

Returns all conversion objects.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

### Example Response

``` json
[
    {
        "id": "1",
        "type": "currency",
        "value": "100",
        "timestamp": "2023-10-01T12:00:00Z"
    },
    {
        "id": "2",
        "type": "unit",
        "value": "50",
        "timestamp": "2023-10-01T12:05:00Z"
    }
]

 ```

response.name: 200 OK - Conversions Retrieved

body.raw:
{ 
    "sourceId": 1,
    "destinationId": 4,
    "bidirectional": false,
    "slope": 3,
    "intercept": 1.2,
    "segmentNote": "Default Segment: OED created for meters kWh -> Electric_Utility",
    "note": "OED created for meters kWh -> Electric_Utility"
}

request.description:
## Purpose

---

Add a new conversion and the default conversion segment associated with it.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| sourceId | integer | yes |
| destinationId | integer | yes |
| bidirectional | boolean | yes |
| note | string | no |
| weekPatternsId | number | no |
| slope | number | yes |
| intercept | number | yes |
| segmentNote | string | no |

body.raw:
{ 
    "sourceId": 1,
    "destinationId": 4,
    "bidirectional": false,
    "slope": 3,
    "intercept": 1.2,
    "segmentNote": "Default Segment: OED created for meters kWh -> Electric_Utility",
    "note": "OED created for meters kWh -> Electric_Utility"
}

request.description:
## Purpose

---

Edit a conversion.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| sourceId | integer | yes |
| destinationId | integer | yes |
| bidirectional | boolean | yes |
| note | string | no |

## Purpose

---

Delete a conversion and all conversion segments associated with it.

## Authorization

---

This request requires admin authentication.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| sourceId | integer | yes |
| destinationId | integer | yes |

item.description: The **conversions** folder contains API requests for managing unit conversions. A conversion defines the relationship between two units (source and destination). Each conversion can have one or more associated conversion segments that specify how the conversion varies over time.

request.description:
## Purpose

---

Authenticates users and returns a JSON Web Token with their user ID.

## Query Params

---

| **Field** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| username | string | yes |
| password | string | yes |
